titleStmt.title: A paterne of a passionate minde conteining a briefe description of the sundry straunge affects of the minde of man : in the ende where-of is set downe a lesson, meete to be learned of all estates in generall.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616. Philosophical discourse, entituled, The anatomie of the minde.
H. W.

notesStmt.note: Abridgement of: A philosophicall discourse, entituled, The anatomie of the minde.--Cf. p. [47].
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
